scripts.start: yarn run install-backend && concurrently "yarn run start-client" "yarn run start-server"
scripts.start-service: yarn run install-backend && concurrently "yarn run start-client" "yarn run start-server-service"
scripts.dev: yarn run install-backend && concurrently "yarn run start-client" "yarn run start-server"
scripts.start-server-service: . venv/bin/activate && cd src/server && /home/app/News-App/venv/bin/gunicorn --workers 3 --bind unix:webapp.sock -m 007 run:app && python3 src/server/ArticlesFetcher.py
